title: External Hard Drive Failure and Data Recovery - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: External Hard Drive Failure and Data Recovery
description: An external hard drive broke, and it's up to Krazy Ken to recover the data. Does he have what it takes to "crack the case"? That pun will make sense later. Perhaps this project will finally cause Krazy Ken to bend and break.  Watch the Druaga1 collab   Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for new content!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter    Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #51 - External Hard Drive Failure and Data Recovery  Contact the CC    Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.) Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.
